transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ansari building and construction se baat kar rahe hain na, Gulbarga?
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, kal ek call less bol rahe the sir, call less IndiaMART se aapke account manager.
Customer: Aapka call aaya tha aap, maine aap se company name pucha aapne call disconnect kar diya.
Customer: Uh, sir wo aawaz nahi barobar aap aa rahi thi.
Executive: Hmm, bataiye, bataiye.
Customer: Sir ye ja raha tha sir jaise apna ye buyer contact pe maine click kiya hai aur unpe aapka number bhi likha aa likha hua rehta hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To in se baat ho rahi thi na jaise wo factory aane ke liye hui thi, customer se baat hui hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo factory aane ke liye bol rahe, main kaha dekhiyega jab aapka time hoga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To ye online nahi ho, online nahi ho sakta sir order jaise ho jate bahar ke hain. Maharashtra ka hai aur idhar Chennai ka hai ja bahar se hote hain.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To uske liye puchna chah raha tha main uske liye bhi ho jata hai order?
Executive: Order ho jata hai matlab main samjha nahi.
Customer: Jaise sir main bahar supply karna chah raha hu mal bahar, Mumbai hua, Maharashtra hua, Pune hua.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To uske liye buyer, buyer ki requirement chahiye thi mujhe waha pe bhi bhejna tha mal bana ke.
Executive: To jaise aapne baat ki bahar se jaise Tamil Nadu ka koi client buyer hai, aapne baat kiya usse, jo bhi uski requirement hai aapne usse baat karke uska requirement banaya, banane ke baad aap transport through aapka jo bhi transport easily aap waha tak pahuchata ho aap unse baat karke aap unhe bhijwa sakte hain.
Customer: Okay, okay, okay. Main ye puchna chah raha tha sir waha ki bahut kam aa rahi hai na jaise bahar ki hai.
Executive: Aap bahar ko uthaiye koi dikkat nahi aapko, aapka to pan India service chal raha hai na.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, service aapka pan India hai to pan India mein kahin se bhi aap le sakte ho.
Customer: Yahi puchna chah raha tha sir main bas aap se.
Executive: Haan, dusra rahi baat agar aapko transport ka bhi agar kuch chahiye ki transport wagera to IndiaMART sir aapko ek option aur deta hai ship with IndiaMART uske through aap apna transport wagera bhi dekh sakte hain jo bhi transport ke charges wagera hota hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar aapke paas agar availability hai agar contact mein hai to aap unke through aap bhej dijiye agar nahi hai to aap waha se bhi kya kehte hain transport wale ka number wagera leke aap unse baat chit karke jo bhi charges hai aap uske basis pe aap unhe provide kar sakte hain.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai, thik hai. To jo aapka service chal raha hai wo pan India chal raha hai aap kahin se bhi requirement uthaiye koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Sir, okay. Hmm, aur koi dikkat sir abhi kal hi to sir aap se baat hua tha maine aapko bola bhi tha ki kuch bhi sir dikkat ho aap mujhe bataiyega to aapne bola ha thik hai.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: To haan, to call to sir mere hi paas aati hai na as a account manager call mere hi paas aati hai.
Customer: Achha, achha. Haan, haan, kyuki aapke account manager mujhe assign kiya gaya hai na.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Thik hai sir koi problem aayi main aapko call karunga, okay?
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. To ye concern main aapka close kar du fir abhi aapka concern raise ho jata hai na hamare paas.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, to aapke paas na iska feedback jayega.
Customer: Ji, kar dijiye.
Executive: Haan, to aap us pe feedback se satisfied yes karke aap share kar dijiyega. Thik hai sir? Baki kuch agar hota hai to mera number hai hi WhatsApp bhi calling bhi aap mujhe call bhi kar sakte hain.
Customer: Okay ji, okay, thank you.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about outside order requirements.

- Wants to know about transport service.



Resolution:

- Explained about pan India service.

- Explained about transport service.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- pan india, transport, requirements
